

```{r, echo=F}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)


sunspots_rmse <- read.csv("../../data/Univariate/sunspots_RMSE.csv")
colnames(sunspots_rmse) <- c("index", "Missing percentage", "LOCF RMSE", "Mean Impute RMSE", "Linear RMSE", "Kalman RMSE")


sunspots_rmse %>% 
  select(-index) %>% 
  mutate(across(c("LOCF RMSE", "Mean Impute RMSE", "Linear RMSE", "Kalman RMSE"), round, 2)) %>%
  kable(caption = "RMSE for data imputation methods on Sunspots dataset \\label{tab:RMSE_sunspots}", 
        format = "latex", booktabs = TRUE) %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = "striped")
```
